mapper.select: select ID, TASKID, GROUPID, STORAGEID, STORAGENAME, LOCATIONID, LOCATIONNAME, BASKET, RESOLVEBASKET, SHIPBASKETHEAD, ORDERID, ITEMID, PRODUCTID, ORDERNUM, DETAILNUM, PICKEDNUM, RESOLVENUM, TYPE, FLAG, CONTENT, ORDERTIME, PICKOPER, PICKTIME, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, OPER, OPERTIME from DB_SHIPTASK_ITEM_HISTORY where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
